Disappearing Messages are also on Viber for Desktop! Time messages to self destruct for extra privacy on every platform. Play with our new lenses reality altering filters and masks and send hilarious photos and videos. Tap the camera icon and enjoy.

Viber lenses are here! Open Viber s camera and play with reality altering filters and masks and send hilarious photos and videos. Tap the camera icon Ghost icon. Disappearing Messages are finally in group chats as well! Time messages to self destruct some things don t need to last forever even in group chats. Tap More in the input bar Timer icon Select time.

Set reminders on Viber with My Notes. No more switching between apps all your messages and reminders are in one place! Long tap any message on My Notes Tap Set Reminder. Start a call in any group chat no matter its size by tapping the top icon in the group chat and selecting up to 19 participants you want on the call. No more hassles. Swipe left on any of your messages to select multiple messages you want to delete or forward.

Express how you feel with Message Reactions in Communities and group chats. Long tap the heart icon next to the message and to show how you feel. Quiz anyone on anything in group chats or Communities using Quiz mode. Whether it s for school or fun tap the Polls icon and start quizzing!

Create amazing stickers from your photos! Shape your sticker and make it just how you want it! Decorate it with doodles text and more Hide notes you ve completed and marked as done on My Notes. Oh the satisfaction!

Viber s new privacy enhanced version includes: Increased security the padlock icon confirms that all your messages including groups and cross platform messages are end to end encrypted Hidden Chats hide away specific chats so nobody knows they even exist Contact authentication a new layer of security allows you to protect yourself further with a simple trust contact mechanic Like media from the preview screen click the heart to like photos and videos even while you re watching them Reduced app size Viber now takes up less space on your phone.
Stability Improvements

More detailed info in group chats see which of your friends have read and liked any message 3D touch support short cut to create a new message or access your latest chats Split View and Slide Over for Multitasking on iPad Conversation Gallery see all your photos and videos from a chat in one place Improved Search
Stability improvements

Viber now works with Wink messages check out the Wink app to send messages that disappear after they ve been viewed More detailed info in group chats see which of your friends have read your message Keep media setting choose how long your photos and videos are stored for New share menu share Viber more easily with your friends Design enhancements to introduction screens

In app banner indicates that you received new messages Automatically download new photos for faster viewing You can now add a caption to the photos and videos you send Easily browse through photos received from specific users or groups Show only groups in messages screen so you can quickly find a specific group Larger photos and larger photo thumbnails Better looking contact info screen New package of fun stickers Accessibility is now supported Viber is also localized to: Czech Danish Greek Finnish Hungarian Polish Swedish Turkish Korean Dutch Thai Vietnamese Malay and Indonesian In addition to previous languages: Russian Arabic Hebrew Japanese Chinese Simplified Chinese Traditional Spanish Catalan German French Italian Portuguese and Portuguese Brazil . IMPORTANT: if you are still using iOS 3.x please do NOT upgrade to this version. Viber for iPhone let s lets you make free phone calls and send free text messages to other iPhone users that have Viber installed. What s New in Version 2.1 iOS 5 compatible. Improved voice quality All new Voice engine! Your calls will sound better than ever when talking to other users with Viber 2.1. Even on networks with less bandwidth such as EDGE networks. Viber is now location aware! Share your current location with your contacts so that they will know from where your message was sent. When sharing your current location it will be attached to every outgoing message. You can enable or disable this option by tapping the location services icon inside the input box. Viber now lets you send and receive Photos via Viber messages. To send photos just tap on the photos button which has been added to the left of the input box. You will now be able to take a photo or send an existing one from your library. Share your photos with others Photos can be shared on Facebook sent via mail and forwarded through Viber to other Viber contacts. User Experience We are constantly working to improve the user experience on Viber this involves research and analytics efforts along with reviewing your feedback. We changed the order of the tabs in order to improve accessibility to the Messages section. This section contains all of your recent messages. You can now place calls right from the conversation screen. Know when your friend is there and actually answering your recently sent message. New is typing indicator will be shown to notify you when he or she is typing a new message for you. Landscape support for Messages the option you all were looking for is now supported. New and improved Busy screen if your contact is currently busy you can simply leave him or her a free text message. Minor improvements to messages sending behavior Viber will now try harder to deliver your messages: If your message was not sent you will be notified and you will have the option to resend it. We have rearranged the More screen and added new customization features that can be accessed via the new Settings section. And of course we removed many many bugs and possibly added a few . If you have any suggestions questions or comments please visit: http: helpme.viber.com We are always happy to hear your thoughts.
Minor bug fixes
bug fixes
Fixed graphics for standard resolution e.g. 3GS Disabled vibration for message reception sending Bug fixes

What s New 1. Viber now has free text messaging! Send and receive free text messages to and from all your Viber contacts. We ve added a new tab called Messages. To send a text simply select a contact from your list and start texting for free. New Free Text Message button added to Viber contact details. Tap this button to send this user a free message. Viber will also notify you about incoming messages so you won t miss a word single text. 2. Favorites tab location changed To view your Favorites go to the contacts tab and tap the Favorites button at the top. 3. Improved calling mechanism Now you ll always know the status of your outgoing calls. Once a call is placed a Calling state will indicate that Viber is now connecting to the other party. Once a connection is established a Ringing state will indicate that the other party s Viber is now actually ringing note that a call can still be established even if you don t see the Ringing state . 4. Placing regular calls through Viber A Don t show again option was added for to the Place a regular carrier call inform dialog. 5. Giving You More Control A new option provides the ability to deactivate your Viber account so that you can easily reactivate Viber with a new phone number. Find this option under the More menu. Important! Don t kill Viber! To make sure you always get incoming call message notifications and that an incoming Viber call is rejected as busy when you re on a regular call we strongly recommend that you to keep Viber running in the background. This does not drain your battery or use up memory and improves your Viber experience. Bugs be gone! 1. Who has Viber Missed out on some Viber contacts We ve now improved the Viber recognition engine. So check out your Viber contact list and see who else have has Viber. 2. Improved Badges Viber badges are now more reliable and will notify you about the number of your missed calls unread messages. 3. Connectivity Since the release of Viber we ve continued making several improvements to our calling mechanism. On In Viber 2.0 we fixed the stuck on answering bug and improved the time it takes calls to connect. 4. And other small fixes

We added a new tab called Messages the flow is very intuitive and simple Pick a contact from your list and start texting for free. New Free Text Message button added to Viber contact details. Tap this button to send this user a free message. Viber will also notify you about incoming messages so you won t miss a word. 2. Favorites tab location changed To view your favorites go to the contacts tab and tap the favorites button at the top. 3. Improved calling mechanism Now you ll be easily aware of your outgoing calls status. Once a call is placed Calling state will indicate that Viber is now connecting to the other party. Once a connection is established a Ringing state will indicate that the other party s Viber is now actually ringing note that call can still be established if you don t see Ringing . 4. Placing regular calls through Viber Don t show again option for the Place a regular carrier call inform dialog. 5. Giving You More Control New option is now available which allows you to deactivate your Viber account so you can easily reactivate Viber with a new phone number. Find this option under the More menu. So check out your Viber contact list and see who else have Viber. 2. Improved Badges Viber badges are now more reliable and will notify you about the number of your missed calls unread messages. 3. Connectivity Since the release of Viber we ve continued making several improvements to our calling mechanism. On Viber 2.0 we fixed the stuck on answering bug and improved the time it takes calls to connect. 4. And other small fixes

We ve got new features! Call quality indicator: keep track of your call quality with the new call quality indicator! During a Viber call you ll find the indicator at the top right hand corner of your call screen. This will show you the quality of your network which affects your Viber conversation quality. Privacy policy: We respect your privacy. View the policy right off of the Viber application simply go to the More tab and click on Privacy Policy. Bugs be gone! Voice quality improvement: our top priority is to deliver the best audio calls. We made changes and improvements to make it even better ! Call connection improvement: did some of your Viber calls get stuck on Answering Or did you not hear your friend well at the start of your conversation We made fixes based on your feedback and requests. Let us know if you still experience any of these issues. Bluetooth improvement: Bluetooth support is now working much better on Viber. So talk with a free Viber call and hands free as well. Country code improvement: we have improved the country codes on Viber. If you have been having problems setting up Viber because of this issue check the list of updates on our support site: http: support.viber.com And more bug fixes.

This is a bug fix version. Stay tuned for new features soon... Fixed: Viber is stuck on busy after network related problems Fixed: on iOS 3.1.x after exiting Viber starting Viber again immediately may fail Fixed: on iOS 3.1.x registration restarts when exiting Viber to read SMS Fixed: voice engine audio interrupt issues e.g. incoming GSM call Fixed: Ringback tone sometimes not heard via speakers Fixed: crash during startup Fixed: call screen disappears during call Workaround: no audio problem after using an old 1.1 Bluetooth device Added: help on how to turn notifications back on Added: help with activation SMS issues Cosmetic changes

Secret Chats For all of your off the record conversations secret chats let you set a timer on all messages so they disappear after a few seconds get an alert when a screenshot is taken and be sure no messages get forwarded. Of course all of this is protected by Viber s end to end encryption. Stickers on photos ! All of your stickers can now be stuck right onto your photos! Doodle on photos Doodle on your friends faces before you send them photos.
